description: The Devold® Herøy collection is a series of lightweight and comfortable hiking gear for men and women, consisting of a pair of pants, a pair of shorts and a jacket. The unique Merino wool-blended fabric is strong, soft and light. It provides excellent breathing capabilities, high durability and good elasticity. In addition, wool naturally helps to adjust your body temperature, an important feature when you're out hiking. The garments are developed for movement, and the articulated knees provide increased freedom of movement and comfort. With several pockets, a comfortable fit, reflective details and smart solutions, the Devold® Herøy collection is the ultimate gear for hiking.
name: Devold Heroy Merino Jacket - Mens
